name: The Operational Art of War, Vol. 2: 1956-2000
name_original: The Operational Art of War, Vol. 2: 1956-2000
description:
The Operational Art of War, Vol. 2: 1956-2000 is a strategy game developed by TalonSoft. It came out on 01-01-1999. TalonSoft published the game.
You can play The Operational Art of War, Vol. 2: 1956-2000 on PC.
